title: Google Pixel Watch battery and connectivity details emerge
content:
We’ve seen quite a bit of the Google Pixel Watch over the past couple of weeks. First, it was a Pixel Watch render, then live photos of the device. Although its appearance may no longer be a mystery, there are still a lot of unanswered questions about the device. If a source is to be

The post Google Pixel Watch battery and connectivity details emerge appeared first on XDA.
description: We've seen the Google Pixel Watch through renders and leaked images. Now, we get details about its battery and cellular connectivity.
